elements.name: Verify API: getCountryCount API return Total Country Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCountryCount"
User calls "getCountryCount" API with "Get" http Request
Verify country_Count result is greater than 0
The API call is success with StatusCode 200

elements.name: Verify API: createCountry API add Country payload

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Country Payload
User calls "createCountry" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Country instance
Verify Total country_Count increased by 1

elements.name: Verify API: createCountry API with no country Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Country Payload  with no Country Body
User calls "createCountry" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.country.entity.Country com.ibm.dc.country.controller.CountryController.createCountry(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.country.entity.Country)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.country.entity.Country com.ibm.dc.country.controller.CountryController.createCountry(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.country.entity.Country)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllCountries API return List of All Countries

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllCountries"
User calls "getAllCountries" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries
Total number of Country in List is equal to getCountryCount
Country added exist in returned Country List

elements.name: Verify API: getCountryBySearchCriteria API, search no SearchCriteria

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCountryBySearchCriteria"
User calls "getCountryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries
All Countries should have Active Status

elements.name: Verify API: getCountryBySearchCriteria API, search by 'countryId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getCountryBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "countryId"
User calls "getCountryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries
Response should be list of Countries and size should be one
Country added exist in returned Country List

elements.name: Verify API: getCountryBySearchCriteria API, search by 'countryName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getCountryBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "countryName"
User calls "getCountryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries
Country added exist in returned Country List

elements.name: Verify API: getCountryBySearchCriteria API, search by 'countrySectorName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getCountryBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "countrySectorName"
User calls "getCountryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries
Country added exist in returned Country List

elements.name: Verify API: getCountryBySearchCriteria API, search by 'countryId' & 'countryName' & 'countrySectorName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getCountryBySearchCriteria with Parameter: 'countryId' & 'countryName' & 'countrySectorName'
User calls "getCountryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries
Response should be list of Countries and size should be one
Country added exist in returned Country List

elements.name: Verify API: getCountryBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'countryId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCountryBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "countryId" = "-9"
User calls "getCountryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getCountryBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'countryName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCountryBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "countryName" = "invalidCountryName"
User calls "getCountryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getCountryBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'countryGeographyName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCountryBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "countryGeographyName" = "invalidCountryGeographyName"
User calls "getCountryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Countries with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: deleteCountry update Country status as Passive

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke deleteCountry with Parameter: "countryId"
User calls "deleteCountry" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify CountryStatus of particular Country updated as Passive

elements.name: Verify API: deleteCountry API,  with invalid countryId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "deleteCountry" with invalid Parameter: "countryId" = "-9"
User calls "deleteCountry" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Country with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: deleteCountry API, with no Param

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "deleteCountry" with no Param
User calls "deleteCountry" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'countryId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updateCountry API add Country paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Country Payload
User calls "updateCountry" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify Country fields gets updated

elements.name: Verify API: updateCountry API, with no Country Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Country Payload  with no Country Body
User calls "updateCountry" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.country.entity.Country com.ibm.dc.country.controller.CountryController.updateCountry(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.country.entity.Country)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.country.entity.Country com.ibm.dc.country.controller.CountryController.updateCountry(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.country.entity.Country)"
